src_text: Ezintsha ngesifo sentsholongwane i-Corona (i-COVID-19) IKhabhinethi iyavuyiswa kukuhla kwenani labantu abaqinisekisiweyo ukuba bane-COVID-19 kwezi veki zimbalwa zidlulileyo futhi nezinga labantu abaphilileyo kwesi sifo elinyukileyo laya kutsho kuma-87%.
trg_text: Cabinet welcomes the drop in the number of new confirmed COVID-19 cases over the past few weeks and the improved recovery rate that has increased to 87 percen The number of people requiring admission in our hospitals and the demand for COVID-19 tests have also droppe

src_text: Kwaye lehlile nenani labantu abagulela ukuba bangade balaliswe esibhedlela kunye nelabafuna ukuhlolwa i-COVID-12.
trg_text: The recent AG Report also highlighted some irregularities and illegal transactions on the COVID-19 relief package introduced by government to ease economic distress and prevent the spread of the viru

src_text: IKhabhinethi ibamba ngazibini kubo bonke abemi boMzantsi Afrika ngokudlala indima bethobela imiqathango ibimiselwe ukuphungula inani labantu abanale ntsholongwan Sithi mathol
trg_text: Cabinet thanks all South Africans for playing their part in adhering to restrictions to flatten the curv We commend the dedication and sacrifice of all health professionals who have been our frontline defence against the viru

src_text: anyongande kudlelana kwiingcali zezempilo zona ibizizo ebezingamajoni ebesifunza ngawo kwidabi lokulwa le ntsholongwan
trg_text: The findings will be handed over to the multi-agency Fusion Centre that is tasked with investigating COVID-19-related fraud and corruptio Findings include overpricing, government employees applying for relief they were not entitled to, potential fraud and the sidestepping of supply chain management rules and regulation

src_text: Masakhele phezu kwezi ndaba zincumisayo siqhubeke nokusebenzisana senze izinto ezifanelekileyo, ezifana nokuziqhelanisa nokungasondelelani singabantu, sinxibe izigqubuthelo-buso xa siphakathi kwabantu, sihlambe izandla ngesepha namanzi okanye sisebenzise isibulala-ntsholongwana esinechiza le-alkhohol IKhabhinethi ikhuthaza abantu ukuba bakhuphele kwizixhobo zabo zonxibelewano i-COVID Alert SA Application beyithatha ku-Apple App Store okanye ku-Google Pla ISebe lezeMpilo liqulunqe le-app njengesinye sezixhobo zokuxelela abemi boMzantsi Afrika xa bethe badibana nomntu one-COVID-19.
trg_text: Let us build on the momentum of this encouraging news and continue to work together to consistently do the right things, such as practising social distancing, wearing a mask when in public, and washing hands with soap and water or using an alcohol-based hand sanitise

src_text: Le-app sesinye sezixhobo esongeza kwiintonga zethu zokulwa ukunwenwa kwale ntsholongwan
trg_text: The app strengthens our nation s fight against the spread of the viru

src_text: IKhabhinethi ivumile ukuba landiswe ixesha ebelisekelwe imeko yentlekele yezwelonke liyo kutsho kumhla we-15 kweyeDwarha 2020 ngokweCandelo 27(5)(c) loMthetho woLawulo lweNtlekele, wowama-2002 (uNombl 57 wowama-57).
trg_text: Cabinet also approved the extension of the national state of disaster to 15 October 2020 in terms of Section 27(5)(c) of the Disaster Management Act, 2002 (57 of 2002).

src_text: Injongo yoku kukubethelela imigaqo esafunekayo yokulwa ukunwenwa kwe-COVID-19.
trg_text: This is to continue giving effect to the regulations that remain relevant to manage the spread of COVID-19 infection

src_text: Ubundlobongela obusekelwe kwisini (i-GBV) Isihelegu se-GBV siyaqhubeka nokuthwaxa izwe lakuthi ngobundlobongela bobundladiya nokubulawa kwamanina ngoluny Amaxhoba akutsha nje esi sihelegu aquka umdlali weqonga uThandeka Mdeliswa (obeneminyaka engama-34) odutyulwe ekowabo e-Evander, eMpumalanga kunye nomntu wasetyhini obeneminyaka engama-28 obulewe ngumnyeni wakhe ngethuba eyokumangalela ubundlobongela basekhaya kwiSikhululo samaPolisa saseMadeira eMpuma Kolon IKhabhinethi iyabongoza ukuba abo benze ezi zenzo zolwaphulo-mthetho kunye nezinye ezixeliweyo kwabasemagunyeni ukuba bajongane nengqumbo yomtheth
trg_text: The scourge of GBV continues to plague our nation with the senseless violent assault and murder of wome The recent victims of this heinous crime include actress Thandeka Mdeliswa (34) who was shot at her family home in Evander, Mpumalanga and the 28-year-old woman who was killed by her husband while reporting a domestic violence at the Madeira Police Station in the Eastern Cap Cabinet calls for justice to be served on these crimes and others that are reporte

src_text: IKhabhinethi iphumeze imithetho emithathu kutsha nje yokufaka isandla kwidabi lokulwa i-GB Le nguMthetho-siHlomelo oYilwayo wobuNdlobongela basemaKhaya, uMthetho-siHlomelo oYilwayo woLwaphulo-mthetho nemiBa eNxulumene Nalo wowama-2020; kunye noMthetho-siHlomelo oYilwayo woMthetho waLwaphulo-mthetho wowama-2020 (Amatyala ezeSondo neMiba eNxulumene Nawo).
trg_text: Cabinet recently approved three laws to intensify the fight against GB They are the Domestic Violence Amendment Bill; Criminal and Related Matters Amendment Bill of 2020; and the Criminal Law (Sexual Offences and Related Matters) Amendment Bill of 2020.

src_text: Le mithetho iza kuba negalelo kumalinge okuqinisekisa ukuba amaxhoba obundlobongela basemakhaya ne-GBV afumana ukhuseleko olululo nolufanekiley
trg_text: These laws contribute towards ensuring effective and efficient protection for victims of domestic violence and GB

src_text: IKhabhinethi ithunakele yintengiso eyothusa kakhulu epapashwe kwiwebhusayithi yakwa-Clicks, ebangele ukunxakama nokuxokozela koluntu jikelele, futhi oku lukwenza ngakhon IKhabhinethi iyithatha ngokuba le ntengiso isisithuko kwaye inobuhlang
trg_text: Cabinet has noted with great concern an extremely disturbing advertisement published on the Clicks website, which justifiably triggered widespread public outrag Cabinet considers the advertisement profoundly offensive and racis

src_text: Ke ngoko siyawamkela la manyathelo akhawulezileyo athatyathwe ngabakwa-Clicks ukulungisa le nt La manyathelo aquka isithembiso sokusebenzisana norhulumente ukuze kuthengiswe iimveliso zalapha ekhaya kuzo zonke iivenkile zakwa-Clicks kunye nokusebenzisana nawo onke amashishini u-Clicks athenga kuwo iimveliso ukuze kubethelelwe iinjongo ezingundoqo zomgaqo-siseko njengoko ziqulathwe kuMgaqo-siseko weRiphabhliki yoMzantsi Afrika wowe-1996.
trg_text: These include their commitment to work with government to promote local products in all their stores and to collaborate with all their suppliers to promote the constitutional values as enshrined in the Constitution of the Republic of South Africa of 1996.

src_text: Kufuneka le nkampani iqalise nenkqubo yoqeqesho egxininisa kwiyantlukwano nokubandakanywa eza kujolisa kubo bonke abaphathi bayo kunye nabasebenz
trg_text: They will also put in place a diversity and inclusion training programme for all their managers and staf

src_text: IKhabhinethi ihlaba ikhwelo kuzo zonke iinkampani zakwa-Clicks kunye nezinye iivenkile ezizingcali zezibhengezo ukuba ziqalise iinkqubo ezibonakalayo ezigxininisa zize zikhusele amalungelo oluntu, zize zifundise uluntu ngale miba inezothe ifana nobuhlanga, ukungalingani nocalul
trg_text: Cabinet calls on the advertising agencies of Clicks and other stores to also adopt tangible programmes which promote and protect human rights, and raise awareness about despicable issues of racism, inequality and discriminatio

src_text: Isizwe sonke kufuneka sixhase intsebenziswano phakathi kwamasebe karhulumente kunye namaZiko kaRhulumente aXhasa uLawulo lweNtando yesiNinzi xa kuqhutywa amaphulo okufundisa ngokuchasa nokulwa ubuhlanga nocalul Kananjalo, urhulumente ukhumbuza bonke abemi boMzantsi Afrika ukuba libhalwe kuMgaqo-siseko ilungelo lokuchasa nayiphi na into emnxamnye nobulungisa ngaphandle kokoyika ukuba uza kuthathelwa amanyathelo olulek Noko kunjalo, ilungelo lokuqhankqalaza likhatshwa luxanduva lokuqinisekisa ukuba oko ukwenza ngoxolo nangaphandle kokunyhasha amalungelo abanye abant Urhulumente uyawugxeka umonakalo owenziwe kwiivenkile zakwa-Click Izenzo ezingekho mthethweni ezifana nezi zimnxamnye namalungelo oluntu elisekelwe kuwo eli lizwe ukususela oko lalawulwa ngentando yesininz
trg_text: Equally, government reminds all South Africans that the right to speak out against any injustice without fear of reprisal is enshrined in our Constitutio However, the right to protest comes with the inherent responsibility to do so peacefully and without infringing on the rights of other Government condemns the acts of vandalism at Clicks store Such unlawful acts undermine the spirit of human rights that has shaped this country since the dawn of democrac

src_text: UMzantsi Afrika wenza onke amatile-tile ukuqalisa ukuzisa uhlumo kuqoqosho ke ngoko awunakuvumela nantoni na enokukhokelela ekubeni abantu baphelelwe yimisebenzi ngenxa yokuba amashishini evalil Ulwaphulo-mthetho nokonakalisa impahla yamashishini abucala nekarhulumente kufuneka zombini ezi zinto zigxijwe njengoko zingeyondlela iluncedo nenenkathalo yokusombulula iimbamban 4.
trg_text: South Africa is working towards growing the economy and cannot afford to risk the loss of jobs due to business closure Lawlessness and vandalism of private and public property should not be condoned as they are not a responsible and progressive option to resolve a conflic 4.

src_text: Ezoqoqosho Ukuncipha kakhulu kweSambuku seMveliso yeLizwe yoNyaka kwiKota yesi-2 yaya kutsho kwiqondo elilelona liphantsi ezimbalini elingu-1 elithe xa libalwa njengelonyaka wonke laya kutsho ku-5, ngenxa ye-COVID-19, kusenze saxhalaba ukuba kungenzeka sifikelela kwiqondo elaliqikelelwe kuHlahlo Lwabiwo-mali lokuXabangela lokuba uqoqosho lweli luza kuhluma ngo- (-) kowama-2020.
trg_text: The steep contraction of our Quarter 2 Gross Domestic Product to record levels of 16,4% annualized to 51,2% as a result of COVID-19, raises the risk of reaching the Supplementary Budget forecast of - growth in 2020.

src_text: Oku kungqina ukuba urhulumente wahlaba ekhangele ngokuqulunqa ngokukhawuleza isicwangciso sokuvuselela uqoqosho, esebenzisana nawo onke amahlakani ezentlalo ukuze kubuyiselwe uqoqosho lweli endleleni eya kuhlum
trg_text: This affirms the correctness of government s decision to urgently embark on an economic recovery plan, working together with all our social partners to get the economy on a better growth trajector

src_text: Esi sicwangciso, siza kukhokelwa ngamaphulo ophuhliso lweziseko ezingundoqo, siza kuquka nokwenziwa kotshintsho olufunwa ngabomvu kwindlela olwakhiwe ngayo uqoqosho lwel
trg_text: The plan, which will be infrastructure led, will also include implementation of much-needed structural reform 5.

src_text: IKhabhinethi icela abantu base-Eldorado Park ukuba bancedise i-IPID ukuba iqhubeke yenze umsebenzi wayo kodwa oko bakwenze besebenzisa iindlela ezisemthethweni ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuba kugquba ubulungisa kula ndaw
trg_text: Cabinet calls on the community of Eldorado Park to assist the IPID and continue to work within the criminal justice system to ensure that justice prevail 6.

src_text: Ingxelo yoMphicothi-zincwadi-Jikelele engentengo enxulumene ne-COVID-19 INgxelo ka-AG yakutsha nje ibhentsise ukuba bekukho unyawo lwemfene kwezinye izivumelwano nokophulwa komthetho kwezinye iintlawulo ezenziweyo kwimali ebivela kwingxowa karhulumente yokulwa i-COVID-19 ukuze kuphungulwe umonakalo ubunokwenziwa yile ntsholongwane kuqoqosho kuze kuthintelwe nokunwenwa kway
trg_text: Cabinet encourages all people in South Africa to download the free COVID Alert SA Application from the Apple App Store or Google Pla The Department of Health introduced the app as another tool to alert South Africans if they have been exposed to someone with COVID-19.

src_text: Amanyathelo okungenelela esizwe kutshintsho lwemozulu IKhabhinethi ivumile ukuba kusekwe iKhomishini kaMongameli yokuQuquzelela uTshintsho lweMozul Oku kuhambelana nesiVumelwano sesiCwangciso-sikhokelo seNgqungquthela kaMongameli yeMisebenzi esatyikitywa ngethuba kubanjwe iNgqungquthela kaMongameli yeMisebenzi ngowama-2018.
trg_text: Cabinet approved the establishment of the Presidential Climate Change Coordinating Commissio This is in line with the Presidential Job Summit Framework Agreement signed during the Presidential Job Summit in 2018.

src_text: Le khomishini iza kukhokela xa isizwe sakuthi sitshintshela kwixesha noqoqosho olunyamezelayo noluvelisa isisi esincinci ngowama-2052.
trg_text: The commission will coordinate the just transition of our country to a low carbon climate and resilient economy and society by 2052.

src_text: Le khomishini iza kwakhiwa ngabo baza kumela urhulumente, amahlakani ezentlalo, imibutho yoluntu kwakunye neengcali eziphuma kumaziko emfundo ephakamileyo nawophando-nzul UMzantsi Afrika lelinye lamazwe atyikitya isiVumelwano sesiCwangciso-sikhokelo soTshintsho lweMozulu seZizwe eziManyeneyo (i-UNFCCC).
trg_text: The structure will be represented by government, social partners, civil society as well as experts from academia and research institution

src_text: IKhabhinethi ikwavumile nokuba kungeniswe isiCwangciso-qhinga soPhuhliso oluVelisa iSisi esiyiNgozi kokusiNgqongileyo esiNcinci (i-LED) kwi-Ofisi kaNobhala we-UNFCC Esi siCwangciso-qhinga se-LED siza kufaka isandla kumgaqo-nkqubo wesizwe wotshintsho lwemozulu nophuhliso ngendlela ecwangcisiweyo nevakalay Sinika namanyathelo okuthibaza umonakalo agxininisa kumacandelo angundoqo ezoqoqosho amane angala: elezaMandla; elezaMashishini; elezoLimo, elezamaHlathi nokuSetyenziswa koMhlaba; kunye neleNkunkum
trg_text: Cabinet also approved the submission of the country s Low Emission Development (LED) Strategy to the UNFCCC Secretaria This LED Strategy will advance the national climate change and development policy in a more coordinated, coherent and strategic manne It provides mitigation measures focusing on four key sectors of the economy, namely Energy; Industry; Agriculture, Forestry and Land Use; and Wast 2.

src_text: IsiCwangciso-qhinga seSizwe sokuQokelelwa kweNkunkuma (i-NWMS) sowama-2020 IKhabhinethi iyivumile i-NWMS yowama-2020 ukuba ingene endaweni ye-NWMS yowama-2011.
trg_text: Cabinet approved the 2020 NWMS to replace the 2011 NWM The waste management strategy gives into effect the terms of the National Environmental Management: Waste Act, 2008 (Act 59 of 2008).

src_text: Esi sicwangciso-qhinga sokuqokelelwa kwenkunkuma sizalisekisa amasolotya oMthetho weNkunkuma: uLondolozo lweNdalo lweSizwe, wowama-2008 (uMthetho uNombl 59 wowama-2008).

src_text: Amazwi okuvuyisanaIkhabhinethi ithumela amazwi ovuyiswano neminqweno emihle: kuMlawuli-Jikelele (u-DG) wangaphambili kwi-Ofisi kaMongameli, uGq Cassius Lubisi, njengoko emshiya urhulumente ethatha umhlala-phantsi emva kokuba esebenze njengomsebenzi karhulumente ongumzekelo omhle kwi-Ofisi kaMongameli nakwiphondo laKwaZulu-Nata UGq Lubisi waziwa njengomsebenzi karhulumente obethembekile, eziphethe ngesimilo nesidima futhi enesibindi, nowazinikelayo kubizo lokusebenzela abantu boMzantsi Afrik kulowo wayeyi-DG yeSebe lezeMpilo, uGq Precious Matsoso, ngokuthi achongwe njengomnye okwiGqiza eliziMeleyo lokuLungela nokuLwa uBhubhane loMbutho wezeMpilo weHlabath 2.
trg_text: Death of Nathaniel Julius

src_text: Amazwi ovelwanoIKhabhinethi ithumela amazwi ovelwano: kusapho nabahlobo bembongi edumileyo netshantliziyo lezopolitiko uMnu Achmat Dangor owathi wasebenzisa usiba lwakhe ukubhentsisa amanyundululu karhulumente wocalu-calulo ngolo hlobo wangumlomo wabo bavalwe imilom kusapho, abahlobo noogxa bakaNkskz Nyameka Goniwe, obenguSomlomo kaMasipala waseNxuba Yethemba eMpuma Koloni nobekwangumhlolokazi wetshantliziyo loMzabalazo, uTata uMatthew Goniw kusapho nabahlobo bakaGqirha oMkhulu obesele esidla umhlala-phantsi woMkhosi wezoKhuselo weSizwe woMzantsi Afrika, uLieutenant-General Vejay Ramlakan, nowathi wanegalelo elimandla kumzabalazo wenkululeko yabo bonke abemi boMzantsi Afrik kusapho nabahlobo bakaMnu Petrus Meyer, obeteketiswa ngelokuba ngu-Oom Piet, waseNtshona Koloni, kunye noNozaku-zaku uKgo i Mohlamme Piet Mathebe kunye noMnu David Mbulaheni Malada waseLimpop Aba bemi boMzantsi Afrika bazibalulayo banikela ngobomi babo kumzabalazo wenkululeko nolawulo lwentando yesininzi eMzantsi Afrik
